#summary The Governance of SVG-edit

SVG-edit is a community-managed project with the general principles of Free and Open Source software and Open Organizations.

The current admins are:
 * Ahmad Syazwan
 * Brion Vibber
 * Jeff Schiller
 * Marc Laporte
 * Pavol Rusnak

Admins rarely need to vote because decisions are usually consensual and it's a [http://www.communitywiki.org/en/DoOcracy doOcracy]. When a vote is required, these are the people (ex.: for legal/political reasons such as a formal motion needed for external needs). Admins are voted in by other admins.

== Ongoing responsibilities of the Admins ==
 * Add/remove [CommitPolicy commit access] for contributors
 * They also act as a safe guard, as a last resort, to deal with [http://producingoss.com/en/difficult-people.html Difficult People] or [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZSFDm3UYkeE Poisonous People].
